header.topics: Relationships, food, work, studying, family, future plans, domestic issues, birthdays

body.u: It's just a diary erm so I thought I'd use this for the year and then I've still got my Filofax at home and find some inserts for the year and start using that again so yeah I do like it and I've got a picture of
oh look at you guys
that's a beach
oh yeah thank you three pounds forty for two pancakes
you can have some cheesy chips if you want
oh my god
feel free to all my cheesy chips I've got loads of food in my bag so don't feel like I'm going to go hungry okay definitely won't
that is so lovely
yeah that's when he came to visit me in June cos I was only back in June between coming back from Germany and going to Peru so that me in that time
ah
and stuff
but yeah

this job interview for there's a festival in Yorkshire called the Deer Shed festival and it's they wanted a press and marketing intern paid for the four months running up to the festival the festival's in July
mm
and
that's amazing four months
and I got selected for the interview and I was like oh my god I wasn't expecting that in Yorkshire
yeah
anyway so I went anyway just to see what is was like so I went up to Yorkshire in the morning and came back in the afternoon
oh my god
so like three and a half hours each way
really?

which wasn't as much as I thought it was going to be I thought it was going to be six hours each way but it was really good actually erm so yeah I was I was in Yorkshire yesterday the interview went quite well I think actually but I'm not sure if I want to relocate to Yorkshire for four months and then come back and be at square one be back at square one with no job it would be the pay is only national minimum wage and I'd have to you know have to pay for somewhere to stay while I'm up there
yeah

and so I don't know if I'd come back with any more money although it would be like a really cool experience like working on a festival but if it was down here I'd do it but seeing as it's up there I don't
do you have anyone you could stay with?
no I don't know anyone up there it's also like do I really want to be away in Yorkshire for so long?
yeah
away from home
is it full time?
yeah it's full time for the whole four months and I'm working up to you're on up to the festival and the festival itself and the job itself sounds like amazing
I'm going to have to take them back
are they horrible?
mm and that's golden syrup it's not maple syrup
yeah that's definitely something about that's shit
I'm really sorry I hope this isn't embarrassing
no
it's like really clumpy it's like really chewy as well
look like honey
yeah I don't know sorry
that's okay
gonna have to do it sorry
are you getting a refund?
yeah they're really nice
getting something else?
they're really nice they were like oh what's that?
I told you I brought food with me thought we'd have a picnic with our tea
amazing erm yeah pancakes so
so are you not going to like order something else then?
maybe I should
I mean obviously feel free to my cheesy chips have as many as you want
don't worry I was mm I don't know cos I'm I'm not like hungry hungry do you have an oyster card?
yeah
oh don't do that chewing gum inside it
sorry I was like too much chewing gum in there
no this was from cos my mum lives in and I went to go see her at the weekend
how are her studies going?
oh my god she's almost dying from it
ah
she is so
it will be so worth it though at the end imagine does she want to be a lawyer?
she's actually coming up for an interview
oh wow so she's at the end of her third year
mm she's at the end of her third year second term so she's just got so much work
dissertation
mm no she's got like three twenty page research projects though and like a bunch of essays as well so it's really super hardcore
yeah
like writing erm but yeah she's coming up for an interview in a temple do you know it? in a temple
no
it's this in London and it's this really really old like centuries old kind of law school type establishment
okay
for lawyers to go and train to go to the bar to become barristers yes please
thank you oh okay cheesy chips
no I'm good honestly
have some cheesy chips
erm so yeah she's doing that really exciting but I still want to know about this stuff in what are you doing in Peru? were you with a family? where did you meet ? is it ?
he's German I met him in Germany
mm
cos when I was out there working as a language teacher
mm

yeah so I was out there working as a language assistant and I got a kind of weekend job as well cos I wanted a bit of extra money I was being paid quite well to be a language assistant but I just wanted more money erm and I got a job as a waitress in this hotel restaurant in town and his parents owned the restaurant and he was a chef there and so one day one day cos I hadn't thought of him in this way until then he was just like my manager
he was your manager
he kind of runs it with his parents like his parents
does he own it?

yeah erm and so yeah so anyway one day he took me by surprise and he asked me out and I was like erm oh okay so anyway we went on a couple of dates and that was really fun erm now we decided to stay together even after I'd left Germany and erm so yeah we're still together now and we've been together since beginning of May last year and he came out to visit me in Peru
mm
and we climbed the Machu Picchu together
oh yeah
to see the pictures?
yeah I did yeah so nice

and that was really cool and he was with me for ten days in Peru and erm then I just went to visit him we talk on Skype every day and like Whatsapp and stuff it's quite easy now with like Whatsapp and that
yeah
we can just talk for free
are you like planning to move or live together or to be in the same country?

the problem is he wants to stay in this town called which is a really lovely town but kind of in the middle of nowhere and there's not really much going on it's a lovely historical medieval town with cobbled streets but it's like you know
sounds pretty logical but it's not

yeah it's lovely to visit you know lovely for a local but not somewhere I'd want to go and live like I I couldn't go out there there's no opportunities for me unless I want to be a waitress or something to work in erm so the problem is he's just bought the brewery cos they brew their own beer
wow

he's just bought the brewery from his dad and he's expanding it and he's got his own side business on their hotel and he's bought this building and he's going to extend it by three times the size and put all his big machines in there and brew all the beer and sell it like across the country at the moment they just sell it at the hotel
yeah
but he wants to market it across the country so he's got his own little business he's setting up
he wants you to work in it?
well no he hasn't said that but he's got no like plans to cos ideally I'd like him to come to London and live with me
so why can't he just own the business and get someone else to do all the grafting?
I don't know that hasn't crossed his mind I don't know whether he wants to be
and then he can be franchise involved or
yeah I mean that would be an idea
have one in London as well
problem is he still lives with like he doesn't live with his parents but he kind of does it's a weird set up like he's lived in all his life in that same house all his life his parents own
and you were like the
restaurant all his life
interesting like quasi exciting woman that walked into his
did go away for a few years to train in France as a chef and then he came back and worked in the restaurant actually his last girlfriend was Hungarian she still works in the restaurant
she still works in the restaurant oh my god
she's really nice actually
is that weird?
mm well I kind of dished with her before I even started seeing so we already kind of knew each other anyway and erm they'd only just broken up like a month before
mm
but erm yeah so she's she's really nice but they their friendship group they're still friends cos they are still in the same friendship group so they still see each other all the time
how long was it like a long one or was it?
two years
three years two years?
mm
that's not too bad

they met they met at a party he said she lived in Hungary and he lived in Germany and they did to and fro a few times and she eventually came to visit and came to live with him and got a job in his restaurant and she's been working there ever since so and then he broke up with her so she had to find a

not a life that's not what you want really and you're capable of just a lot more than waitressing been there and done there as well and it's not something I would want to go back to that would make it a bit weird
so yeah I'm not really sure what we're going to do at the moment we just keep visiting each other and talking on Skype and
let things happen that's the best thing to do actually let things happen organically
yeah well we're going on we're going on holiday to Paris with his friends
oh ah I've been thinking about Paris so much lately
yeah?
yeah to the extent where when I was visiting mum we sat in bed one day we were looking up all of these different Parisian houses and
oh yeah
French châteaus
want to live in Paris?
yeah I will do one day I think next year
next year?
oh my god
I guess you can speak French can't you?
that's the reason I want to go other than loving it and also feeling like maybe I need a bit of a new
start

and a new start and stuff um yeah my French is so rusty now and I never use it so if I go out there and I immerse myself I'll have more of a chance of learning it and it will be handy for medicine so I've gone to the
yeah definitely
and also I'd want to go and work for them and my uncle has given me the offer of a lifetime
what is it?
I cried when he said this you know my uncle that's not an uncle but totally
oh uncle
yeah he took me under his wing
yeah

he said he sat me down one day cos he came to visit for like an hour or two in London so we met him in London and he sat me down and he said I haven't contributed towards your education he's like put his kids through like private school and everything and he feels like I'm a child I think
yeah
and so he I think he felt like he wanted to do something like that to so he said
that's lovely

haven't contributed towards your education but what I want to do is offer you the travel expenses and subsidise your accommodation for six months if you find a if you find a or an internship with Médecins Sans Frontières abroad
oh that's so nice
so but it has to be by January 2016 cos if I haven't found it but January 2016 then it's not the offer's not there any more
why does if he have a blanket loan or something?
no it's to like make me do it so so
but you've got plenty of time to look haven't you?
no I'm just ah just seeing all of your photos and all of 's photos
travels
yeah I want to travel I haven't travelled before really got I've got itchy feet now yeah and I don't just want to I want to live for a period of time somewhere
I keep thinking if I get a job in Berlin that would be a good compromise cos he's only two hours south of Berlin
that's a really good
there's lot of opportunities in Berlin and also carry on improving my German and stuff
yeah are you actually fluent now though right?
yeah I'm a lot better now and I speak it every day now obviously cos I speak with
in German
in German not in English ever
does he not speak English?
he does but the only time we speak English is like when he came to visit and we were with my parents so we didn't speak any German in front of them but we do speak German together yeah
oh I'm so happy for you it's so bless his heart what's he like what kind of person is he?
he's quite like when I first met him he's got a very gentle voice and he's quite quiet and quite reserved he's not really like in your face which is why I didn't really notice him before
yeah
and erm it's only once he asked me and out and I was like oh alright so I go why not? and then it turned out I had a really good time so I was yeah
that's so cute so cute
erm yeah he's I don't know he's really nice he's really gentle he's really thoughtful he's really romantic
is he?

I was in the office one day in Peru I just got this erm someone came over to me and said oh there's someone at the door for you and I was like okay so he didn't fly all the way over I was like who's this? bit weird so I opened the door and it was a man with a big bunch of flowers
oh
and he'd ordered a big bunch of flowers to be delivered to my office from this really cute romantic note like I love you so much
oh my god
the most wonderful girl in the world and it's like I walked into the office and everyone was like they were absolutely humungous
oh my god that's so lovely though isn't it?
it wasn't for a reason he just did it
bless him
and for my birthday
nice guy

he stayed he left the week before my before cos obviously my birthday I was in Peru and then we said to cos his birthday was also while I was in Peru so I said we'll do birthday presents when I come and visit you in Germany and we won't bother doing it before so I wasn't expecting anything so anyway on my birthday I go downstairs cos we lived in a block of flats where there was a doorman and he let us in and out and I was walking to work one day and just as I was going out the door the doorman said oh I've got something for you and it was a birthday card with a rose in a plastic pouch and it was like a real rose and it was freeze dried so it will never die
oh my god
and it said erm erm hi I just didn't want to leave you with nothing on your birthday have a really good day at work and I thought oh that's cute thought that was it
what?
so we also had a maid that used to come in and clean every day
no way
so I got home and there was a present and a card on my bed
on my bed?
which he'd given to the maid and said on her birthday can you put that on her bed
on your bed particularly on your bed?
yeah from him so I was like oh my god I've got another present
that must have been so weird
it was
to find something that you hadn't left

well I knew the maid there so it must have been something he'd given to the maid to put on my bed so I opened it and mm I opened the present and the card said erm go onto your computer and open this document it's a it's a password protected document you've got to find the password yourself I'll give you a clue it's related to the last love letter I sent you we were sending each other letters while I was in Peru
yeah
and then anyway a long story short I found the password was and it was something like I love you one two three four
right

I opened this password protected document on my computer and it said now if you go to somewhere close to where your other present was you'll find another little surprise so I was like well must be under my bed then I'm guessing and there was a present under my bed that he'd put there while I was there
oh my god no way
with a card
he put there?
yeah he actually put there
another card

three cards got so many cards this card said well done for finding this present up to now you might want a break so I recommend that you go to this particular bar and order this particular drink and I was like oh my god
oh my god
so my house mate and I we we cos there was three of house living in a house so the company put us up in a flat together so there were three of us two American girls and me
yeah
and I went to this bar
yeah
that was just down the road
yeah

well unfortunately it had been closed down the day before for two weeks by the health and safety people and so I was like oh okay I hope that was the last one and I you know I don't have to go to somewhere else so anyway we just went out somewhere else and the next day I said you know I went to the bar I don't know what was there but erm you know I couldn't pay for my drink
oh

he'd already pre paid for my drink as well he paid for my drink so he'd arranged with the people behind the bar that he would he'd paid for this drink that I was going to order and then that was the signal for them to give me my present my main birthday present anyway
no oh my god

so I sent them I wrote them a little note cos I said I thought you know the boss must be going in and out at some point like someone will be so I wrote a note saying my boyfriend came in a week ago and gave you a present to give to me I was just wondering if you could email me and I can come and collect it or something anyway someone called me up and said yeah come down so I went and collected it and it was this picture of us that he'd ordered and it was in a block of plastic so it was in the back so it
oh yeah
was like a block of plastic and our picture at the back
yeah
it's all nicely wrapped and everything
and what so it's stand free standing
so it stands up yeah so I mean it was a really romantic idea it just didn't quite work out the way he'd planned
oh bless him he must have been so annoyed
and it opened a week after that opened back again
oh my god so much effort went into that and it's really shit that they didn't like
well they didn't know
they didn't know how to contact him?
yeah they didn't know how to contact him cos he thought you know oh that's my job done
you would never think oh this place is going to be shut down the day before as well

yeah cos and I had Spanish lessons and we walked past it every day and we walked past it the day before and there were people in there so it was literally that night that they closed down the day before my birthday like the worst timing ever
oh bless him
but at least I did get the present in the end like that wasn't a complete waste
is it that photo?
it's that photo yeah it's the most romantic birthday surprise I've ever had in my life so well planned
oh my god it's so lovely that's so lovely you deserve it so much there were no good men in
oh they were all shit weren't they?
they are all shit lost her bloke I say lost purposefully lost him
how was how was that what happened with that?
she's fine
cos all I know is what she wrote on Facebook
oh yeah
I'm going to get another cup of tea
oh yeah me too
I can grab you one if you want
oh yeah please
I'm afraid I don't have any more hobnobs
ah we will survive
spoons there no spoons left that's your original cup I promise
don't want your cooties
I never told you what I was writing about in Peru guess what my topic area was?
sex?
no
nits?
no
verrucas?
no it's something that I would never have any experience with
breast milk
until I'm a lot older
dementia?
no not that old
erm incompetence?
no menopause
oh no
I was writing this company that has websites for older women about how to deal with menopause
why would you why would you commission someone like a twenty-three year old woman?

cos it's aimed at UK US audiences they every six months they get three new interns in because they want it to be you know grammatically correct and all of that and just make sure that it's written kind of in the style that an English speaker would understand
oh my god oh my god so what did you have to write? so now are you an expert?
I'm an absolute expert I know exactly which herbs to take cos it was like
herbs? herbal?

it was like which exercises to do yeah okay cos the business sells herbal supplements for menopause symptoms and they have a load of websites to kind of for informational websites for women to go onto and be like how do I deal with headaches during menopause how do I deal with a hot flush?
yeah
why do hot flushes happen and stuff? and erm so I had to write these articles and I had to research them and write them
yeah

and erm so I'd get like three articles a day three articles in the morning I'd have to write about how to deal with like all these menopause symptoms and then in the afternoon I'd have to write erm they had this other website called herbases which was just about herbal remedies and herbal living for gen just a general website
mm
and like I'd write an encyclopaedic article about it a potato like history of a potato the scientific information about a potato
a potato
how to cook a potato
no way
it was hilarious
oh my god have you still got them? have you got like a portfolio?
no cos none of our work was I actually got that from for my last birthday my twenty-third
oh my god that is so pretty
yeah
that is so beautiful
yeah I really like that
yeah I think it must be silver
did you have a good birthday by the way? did you get my card?
I did I got it a bit late
I'm glad you got it
because we've got this weird post box system
yeah
and refused to let me have the post key for a while cos she was like it'll get lost so she had it on her thing all the time so I couldn't get into the post box
oh no
but I did get it
so you got your birthday card late
yeah I did but I got it actually yeah yeah no I did get it it was lovely thank you thank you
oh good I'm glad it came so what did you do for your birthday?
actually I was with on my birthday
yeah cos I guess you were like really close weren't you? so
yeah
celebrate together
yeah and she'd been given tickets to Paolo Nutini for her birthday so two tickets and so she and it was on my birthday so
oh okay
it was on the twelfth so she gave one to me as my birthday present and we went and I bought us dinner beforehand cos it was at the 02
oh that's so nice
so we went to do you know ?
no
if you like steak
oh I do like a good steak I love a steak
it is an incredible steak restaurant so we went there and I bought her dinner and then she we went to this gig it was really really cool it was such a nice birthday actually
ah
what did I do in the day? ah I got shat on by a bird on my birthday
that's lucky I was with when she got shat on by a bird in in erm was it ?
yeah
and in
that photo just before it happened
I loved that
oh too funny

so that's what I did really
ah nice birthday
erm yeah it was good I saw I've seen a couple of times too
yeah she mentioned she mentioned that cos I saw I met up with her and actually a few weeks ago
oh my god 's engaged
I know isn't that crazy?
how weird is that?
well I guess they live together so I guess
everything's so like quick though
yeah
I guess that was the same with erm
that's true
all of these marriages have been very quick apart from
ah they're engaged too
I want to go to his wedding but I don't think I'm going to be invited
no me neither
no
never mind we'll have our own weddings
yes do you know what's really funny? is that I've got a Pinterest do you know Pinterest?
yeah yeah
well I've got a board on Pinterest
for weddings

for weddings I suppose loads of women must do mustn't they? I've never done that before and it's never been something that's interested me ever but now for some reason I think I just did it out of like curiosity one day
yeah I love looking at wedding venues I do it all the time
I know me me too I love it and dresses
I was looking at the other day like how to have an eco wedding and I was like I'm going to buy my wedding dress from a charity shop and I'm going to do this like eco venue
oh are you?
and the card's going to be like an eco like card with seeds in that you can plant and like we're going to have like recycled chairs
that's so nice
it's like and we're going to try and make it like a eco wedding
that's a good idea
I was looking up ideas

I try and be
